description.en: In this challenge you will teach your robot wo write. Build a robot that can hold a pencil. Get a piece of paper, stand your robot on it and get yor robot write down three letters: A,B and C.

It's OK if your robot drop the pencil, get it and continue.
You have got 3 trials.

You managed to write the three letters, but they cover each other. = Good job! Let's try again.
You managed to write the three letters but two of them cover each other. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
A,B and C are nicely written, no coverage. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You managed to write the three letters, but they cover each other. = 5 points
You managed to write the three letters but two of them cover each other. = 10 points
A,B and C are nicely written, no coverage. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
